Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a go-ahead three-run homer in the 10th inning
Giancarlo Stanton launched a game-tying, two-run homer in the 6th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees are one step closer to winning their 28th World Series title
Others: The Yankees will face the winner of the Dodgers/Mets NLCS in the World Series
